title: Bamboo Hairbrush
description:
A reflection of timeless craftsmanship and sustainable beauty, the Bamboo Hairbrush by Francesco Palmieri elevates a daily gesture into a restorative ritual.

 

Carved from 100 % sustainable bamboo, this brush honors both hair and planet — combining form, function, and integrity. Its rounded bristles glide effortlessly through the strands, detangling without tension while stimulating micro-circulation across the scalp.

 

Each movement distributes the hair’s natural oils from root to tip, enhancing elasticity and restoring a luminous, healthy sheen.


Naturally anti-static, lightweight, and durable, this brush is a conscious alternative to synthetic tools — designed to reduce breakage, smooth frizz, and leave the hair soft, balanced, and perfectly polished.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Benefits

 

 

  • Gently detangles without breakage or pulling

  • Stimulates scalp circulation, promoting stronger roots

  • Reduces frizz, static, and shedding naturally

  • Distributes natural oils for balanced hydration and shine

  • Sustainably crafted, fully biodegradable, and built to last

 

 

 

 

 

Ritual of Use

 


Use daily on wet or dry hair, starting from the ends and working upward to detangle.

Sweep bristles gently along the scalp in slow, circular motions to awaken circulation and release tension.

For a complete botanical ritual, follow with the Revitalizing Hair Serum to seal moisture and enhance shine.

 

 

 

 

Craftsmanship & Origin

 


Hand-assembled from polished bamboo — a renewable, fast-growing material known for its strength and smooth texture.

Each brush is finished without varnish or plastic coating, ensuring a tactile, grounded connection to nature’s design.

 

 

 

A sustainable instrument of care — harmonizing beauty, balance, and responsibility.
